titles.title: Hospice Support Act of 2009
To amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to eliminate the phase out of the Medicare hospice budget neutrality adjustment factor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/15/2009--Introduced. Hospice Support Act of 2009 - Amends the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to eliminate phase out of the Medicare hospice budget neutralilty adjustment factor.
